remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个 对象，它提供对媒体计时的控制，其方式与动画时间线对象控制动画的方式相同。 is a object which provides control over media timing in the same way that animation timeline objects control animations. 例如，有一个 关联的 和 属性可用于指定媒体开始时间和播放时间。For example, a has associated and properties can be used to specify when media begins and how long it plays. 有关动画时间线的详细信息，请参阅 [动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview) 。See [Animation Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview) for more information on animation timelines. 使用可通过两种方式将 与关联 。There are two ways to associate a to a using a . 1. 在中 ，当作为 目标 a 时 ，将创建一个， 并将其分配给 关联的播放机。Inside of a , when a is targets a , a will be created and assigned to the 's associated player. 有关示例，请参阅 [如何：使用情节提要控制 MediaElement](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-by-using-a-storyboard) ;See [How to: Control a MediaElement by Using a Storyboard](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-by-using-a-storyboard) for an example; 2. 通过 从中显式创建 ，并将其分配给 。By explicitly creating a from a and assigning it to a . 如果将 设置为 `Automatic` (默认) ，则的持续时间 为媒体源的自然持续时间。If the of the is set to `Automatic` (default), the duration of is the natural duration of the media source. 若要以编程方式查找媒体源的自然持续时间，请查询的 属性 。To find the natural duration of the media source programmatically, query the property of the .
